Lets get you set up before we"\n"continue
You are back, we have been"\n"missed

The product is made of 49% of viscose, 44% cotton, 7% linen. To maintain the products quality it is recommended to machine wash up to 30°C/86°F gentle cycle, do not bleach and make sure to iron up to 110°C/230°F.
There is currently no physical store available, but we have an upcoming branch in Indonesia soon.

There are 2 shipping methods available; Express home (arrives within 1 to 2 business days) which cost around 30.000 IDR and Standard home (arrives within 1 to 3 business days) which cost around 15.000 IDR. For returns, kindly send us an email with prove of ur unboxing video and we will send instructions to process the return for you.
